text: nim'ma paiki yaradaru patniyarannu bittu mrtaragiddare a patniyaru nalku tingalu mattu hattu dinagala kala tam'mannu tadedittukollali. A tam'ma avadhiyannu (iddat) purtigolisida balika avaru tam'ma visayadalli, niyama prakara, enu madidaru nim'ma melenu dosavilla. Nivu maduva ellavannu allahanu aritiruttane
